import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom" import styles from "../components/layout/Buscar.module.css" import { Button } from "@mui/material" import styleButton from "../components/layout/StyleButton.module.css" import styleBotaoCheck from "../components/layout/BotaoCheck.module.css" import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom" import React, { useRef, useState } from "react"; function Buscar() { const location = useLocation(); const opcao = location.state; const selecionados = [opcao]; const [isSubscribed, setIsSubscribed] = useState(false); const ref = useRef(null); const handleChange = (index) => { if (ref.target.checked) { console.log('✅ Checkbox is checked'); } else { console.log('⛔️ Checkbox is NOT checked'); } setIsSubscribed(current => !current); }; console.log(selecionados); return (
Buscar
